effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.5 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 722,876.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Grips of the Fel Destroyer

spells.description:
Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 178,802 damage and granting them 1,299 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 520,505, and grants you up to 9,597 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Sinful Gladiator's Sacrificial Dagger

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
